about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: GIS Specialist & Solutions Developer
about.description: I am a GIS specialist and solutions developer with over 3 years of experience at PT. Rekadwipa Teknika Studio. With an educational background in Urban and Regional Planning from Sebelas Maret University, I combine academic knowledge with technical expertise to provide the best solutions.
